name: City Taxi Pick and Drop Sim
name_original: City Taxi Pick and Drop Sim
description:
It is a beautiful morning and a perfect day for work. Wake up and grab your taxi keys to complete some rides. The realistic controls of this game will take you to the real thrilling adventures of driving car. Start your car and shift gear to drive. Take your taxi on the roads and wait for the passengers to request for a pickup. Roads of the city are very busy these days. Duty driving is not that easy. Reach on time to pickup or the passenger will cancel the ride.

Features
• Detailed maps
• Smooth and realistic car handling
• Lots of taxis from around the world
• Realistic damage system
• Tilt steering, buttons and touch steering wheel
• Real engine sounds
